price: ߤߊߟߵߊ߲ ߕߎ߲߬ ߞߊ߬ ߘߊ ߘߏ߫ ߟߊߞߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߛߊ߲ ߠߊ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߕߋ߬ߟߋ߲߫ ߦߟߍ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߦߋ߲߬
arabic: وَلَوۡ فَتَحۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم بَابٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَظَلُّواْ فِيهِ يَعۡرُجُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walaw fataḥnā ʿalayhim bāban mina al-samāi faẓallū fīhi yaʿrujūna
